title: Francesco Farioli - Wikipedia
snippet: Francesco Farioli (Italian pronunciation: [faˈrjɔːli]; born 10 April 1989) is an Italian football manager. He is currently the head coach of Primeira Liga club Porto. Farioli started his coaching career in Turkey with spells at Fatih Karagümrük and Alanyaspor. He then had one season in ...

title: Ajax appoint Francesco Farioli as new head coach - ESPN
snippet: Getty · The Italian manager, who is Ajax's first foreign coach since Dane Morten Olsen in 1999, recently completed his first full season at Nice and guided the team to a fifth-place finish in Ligue 1. Farioli had previously held jobs at Turkish ...

title: Francesco Farioli new Ajax head coach
snippet: The Italian studied philosophy before entering the world of football. He began his career as a goalkeeping coach under Roberto De Zerbi and took his first steps as a head coach in Turkey at the age of thirty.

title: Ajax appoint Francesco Farioli, 35, as new head coach - BBC Sport
snippet: The Dutch club, external said they had reached an agreement with Nice to bring in the 35-year-old Italian, who will start his new role on 11 June. Farioli was manager at Turkish sides Fatih Karagumruk and Alanyaspor before ...

title: Rebuilding Ajax: How Francesco Farioli Has Transformed the Dutch Giants | Opta Analyst
